game.name: Hello Space
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dive into a 2D action game where you control a spaceship, defeat enemies and overcome deadly traps. Extend your arsenal by collecting new weapons and technologies for your ship that you will need to conquer four different dungeon-like worlds, all connected by an open space full of surprises.
